title: Custom width and height
content: Container layout container allows users to control header by setting attributes such as headerHeight, footerHeight, and asideWidth (Header area), footer (bottom area), and aside (left area). The width and height of main (main area) are adaptive.
findIntroStr: Container component for layout, which facilitates page layout creation.
